H0.text: Who won the men's singles title at Wimbledon in 1987. Pat Cash

H1.text: Who won the men's singles title at Wimbledon in 1987. Ivan Lendl

H2.text: Who won the men's singles title at Wimbledon in 1987. Boris Becker

H3.text: Who won the men's singles title at Wimbledon in 1987. Cat Pash

A4.text: Cash defeated the world No. 1, Ivan Lendl, in the final in straight sets.
